segments.text: I notice the way the sunlight filters through the window, illuminating the kitchen in a warm glow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, that warmth feels so distant from the growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems at peace, but there's a storm of chaos brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy clinging to the unstable stool makes my heart race in fear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned around to see the reckless abandon of her children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cookie jar is an invitation to mischief, and they are taking full advantage of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only hope nothing serious happens before she notices the mayhem that's unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR
